text: A cryptogram is a short, coded text. Cryptogram may also refer to: * The Cryptogram, a play by David Mamet * Cryptograms, a studio album by Deerhunter * A newsletter published by Bruce Schneier * A journal published by the American Cryptogram Association ==See also== * Cryptograph, a former Swedish company * Cryptogam, a type of plant * Cryptogramma, a genus of ferns
title: Cryptogram (disambiguation)
